title: 49ers' D.J. Jones proposes to girlfriend before game vs. Browns
text:
CLOSE SportsPulse: Week 5 had some shocking results. Trysta Krick reacts to all the biggest games and moments from a wild weekend in the NFL. USA TODAY

So much for the Jumbotron proposal. Maybe popping the question on the field is the new move for sporting events.

San Francisco 49ers defensive tackle D.J. Jones did just that on Monday, proposing to girlfriend Kayla Fannin during warm-ups at Levi's Stadium approximately two hours before kickoff against the Cleveland Browns.

And Fannin said yes.

Jones, a sixth-round pick out of Ole Miss in 2017, has taken on a starting role in his third year with the 49ers on a defensive line that also features marquee names in DeForest Buckner, Dee Ford and Nick Bosa, among others. He has four tackles so far this year entering Monday night's contest.

A very special pregame proposal 💍



Congrats DJ & family! pic.twitter.com/9jmjqz1aYr — San Francisco 49ers (@49ers) October 7, 2019

Follow Michael Middlehurst-Schwartz on Twitter @MikeMSchwartz.
description: San Francisco 49ers defensive tackle D.J. Jones stepped away from his pregame preparation on Monday to propose to his girlfriend.
